Description.Text:
MONO SUITES IS DESIGNED TO MATCH WITH THE MAGICAL ATMOSPHERE OF SULTANAHMET. IT OFFERS ITS GUESTS COSY STAY WITHIN ROOMS MUCH LARGER THAN OTHER HOTELS IN THE AREA. IT IS A PERFECT CHOICE FOR FAMILIES WITH ITS DOUBLE SIZED COMFORTABLE ROOMS AND BEDS. START THE MORNINGS WITH A RICH AND VARIED OPEN BUFFET TURKISH BREAKFAST IN THE LOBBY RESTAURANT. IN THE TERRACE BAR RESTAURANT YOU CAN ENJOY THE SEA VIEW AND HISTORICAL AMBIENCE. IN THE EVENINGS THE A LA CARTE RESTAURANT OFFERS A DELICIOUS VARIETY OF TURKISH CUSINE WHILE YOU WATCH THE MOONLIGHT OVER THE SEA Note*:
Guests should note that the room(s) is not refundable and any amendments such as names, dates and length of stay will not be accepted
